GPIO
""""""""""""""""""""""""

In adam gpio interface, the /gpio/status and /gpio/open_time is represent as following:

..  csv-table::
    :header: "gpio", "name", "value"
    :widths: 15, 20, 20

    "CO0", "Animal milk", "0, 1"
    "CO1", "Plant milk", "0, 1"
    "CO2", "Sugar", "0, 1, 2, 3"
    "CO3", "Sugar substitute", "0, 1 , 2, 3"
    "CO4", "Vanilla", "0, 1"
    "CO5", "Mint", "0, 1"
    "CO6", "Cinnamon", "0, 1"
    "CO7", "HazeInut", "0, 1"

Sea salt cream
""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

In coffee interface, the /coffee/make ingredients is a 9 string, the 0-7 is CO0-7, and the last one is sea salt cream.

..  csv-table::
    :header: "name", "value"
    :widths: 20, 20

    "Sea salt cream", "0, 1"
